channel.name: CSPAN US
channel.title: Live: Lawmakers Participate in 2025 Congressional Baseball Game
channel.desc: Republicans and Democrats compete against each other in the annual Congressional Baseball Game, a tradition dating back to 1909. The game began raising money for charity in 2016 with the establishment of Congressional Sports for Charity.

channel.name: CSPAN US
channel.title: Q & A
channel.desc: Peter Slen hosts this weekly interview series. Interviews feature people from a wide range of backgrounds, such as journalists, teachers, politicians, authors, historians, influencers, and technology innovators. These people add context to the day's news and bring new ideas to policy. Interviewees have included David McCullough, Pat Buchanan, David Brooks, Tucker Carlson, John Bolton, Susan Page, House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, and others.

channel.name: CSPAN US
channel.title: Prime Minister's Questions
channel.desc: The British Prime Minister answers questions from members of Parliament in the House of Commons.
